activation.en: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

effect.en: Once per Duel, you can discard 1 card, then Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster that mentions "Buster Blader", using monsters from your hand or field as material. While the only monster you control is "Buster Blader" or a Fusion Monster that mentions it, monsters in your opponent's GY become Dragons.

en.set_name: Speed Duel: Streets of Battle City
